metadata.title: USN-2363-1 -- Bash vulnerability
metadata.description: Tavis Ormandy discovered that the security fix for Bash included in USN-2362-1 was incomplete. An attacker could use this issue to bypass certain environment restrictions. (CVE-2014-7169)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-2363-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  bash-builtins - 4.3-7ubuntu1.2 bash-doc - 4.3-7ubuntu1.2 bash-static - 4.3-7ubuntu1.2 bash - 4.3-7ubuntu1.2 No subscription required
